description:
Sakata makes a Goma-chan suit to make his brother happy, but before he can put his plans to action, Big Bro takes the suit to show it to Goma-chan.
As he walks the neighborhood wearing a Goma-chan suit, everyone thinks he’s the real Goma-chan. Meanwhile, Sakata finds the real Goma-chan but thinks he found his brother in the suit...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ゴマちゃんになりたい!
